contentfulSpeakers.name: Eric Gerling
contentfulSpeakers.session: Lessons Learned from a Lifetime of “No”

content.value: Eric is fluent in cloud technologies and favors working on middle- and lower-tier technologies where security, performance, scalability, and reliability are the most important invisible attributes no one asks for, but everyone expects.

Tired of hearing “No” when you want to migrate applications to the cloud or leverage new cloud services? Eric Gerling has given and gotten a lot of “Nos” since opening his first cloud account in 2012. While his work in the cloud is not the sole reason he’s lost all his hair, he does hope to save you from scratching your head when working with the decision-makers in your organization. 

No matter what your cloud ecosystem, you’ll often hear “No” from every direction. Whether it’s Cloud Engineers, InfoSec, Compliance, C-suite, or just someone writing checks to Azure, AWS, Google Cloud, or any other public cloud. 

Key Takeaway: You’ll leave with five ways to arm yourself and overcome rejection so what you hear instead is, “So you’re telling me there’s a chance.”
